alice.tuprolog
Class Agent

java.lang.Object
  alice.tuprolog.Agent

public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object

Provides a prolog virtual machine embedded in a separate thread. It needs a theory and optionally a goal. It parses the theory, solves the goal and stops.

See Also:
Prolog
